isPrivate: %s is at the rank of **Private [PVT]**, to be promoted they need to attend a Basic Military Training. They can ask any Captain+ to assist them.
is2LT: %s is at the rank of **Second Lieutenant [2LT]**, to be promoted they must apply to become an Officer Cadet (1LT) as part of the Officer Corps Academy. For further information they can contact a member of the Department of Progression.
higherThanCPT: %s is too high of a rank to earn Merit. They must be promoted by decision of the Command Staff.
higherThan2LT: %s is at the rank of **%s**, they must be promoted through the Officer Corps Academy. For further information they can contact a member of the Department of Progression.
